nodes.text: Blood orchids were a type of orchid that possessed decorative qualities, which made them good gifts. During the rebellion on the Outer Rim planet Akiva in 4 ABY, the gangster Toomata Wree searched for a gift to give his girlfriend, Looda, and considered presenting her with some blood orchids placed inside the shiny head of a protocol droid.
Blood orchids were first mentioned in Aftermath, a 2015 novel written by Chuck Wendig.
